original_text: I know that there is no good in them, but for a man to rejoice, and to do good in his life.
korean_text: 사람들이 사는 동안에 기뻐하며 선을 행하는 것보다 더 나은 것이 없는 줄을 내가 알았고

sentences.original_text: I know that there is no good in them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들 속에 선한 것이 없음을 알지만

sentences.original_text: but for a man to rejoice
and to do good in his life
